visual_enhancers.scanlines: background: linear-gradient(rgba(18, 16, 16, 0) 50%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25) 50%), linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.06), rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.02), rgba(0, 0, 255, 0.06)); background-size: 100% 2px, 3px 100%; pointer-events: none;
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-filter: blur(12px); background: rgba(10, 10, 10, 0.6); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
visual_enhancers.grid_background: background-image: linear-gradient(rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03) 1px, transparent 1px), linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03) 1px, transparent 1px); background-size: 40px 40px;

universal_guidelines: ALL text content MUST be in French.
Do NOT use gradients on text. Keep text legible and high-contrast.
Do NOT use rounded corners greater than 'sm' (2px). Keep edges sharp.
Maintain the 'Cyber-Tactical' aesthetic: Dark, Neon, Monospace.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install required fonts (Rajdhani, Share Tech Mono, JetBrains Mono) in index.css or index.html.
2. Configure tailwind.config.js with the specified colors and font families.
3. Create a layout wrapper that applies the 'scanlines' and 'grid_background' effects subtly.
4. Update existing Shadcn components to match the 'Cyber-Tactical' style (remove roundness, add borders).
5. Implement the 3D Globe on the Home page and 3D Scatter Plot on the Clustering page using R3F.
6. Ensure all existing functionality (Live Monitor, EDA, ML, Prediction) is preserved and styled.
7. Use the provided image URLs for backgrounds where appropriate.
